forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 18C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 65F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain. The rain will be heavy at times. Low 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. The rain will be heavy at times. Low 58F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High around 20C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 67F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low around 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 18C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 53F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 19C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High around 65F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 19C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High near 65F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 53F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 62F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 50F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 62F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 49F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 64F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
